alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:43AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, Georgetown, southwestern Horry, southwestern Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 743 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake City to 6 miles southwest of Earle to near Wando. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway, Georgetown, Lake City, DeBordieu Colony, Pawleys Island, Yawkey South Island, Horry, Andrews, Johnsonville, Hemingway, North Santee, Rhems, Cades, Pee Dee Crossroads, Oatland, Poston, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Indiantown and Bucksport. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
